kinect_filter.cpp File Reference

kinect_filter node. Applies a median filter to the kinect depth image and after that a voxelgrid based filter to its point cloud. This node publishes a topic with the filtered point cloud. More...

#include <sensor_msgs/Image.h>
#include <cv_bridge/cv_bridge.h>
#include <sensor_msgs/CameraInfo.h>

#include <pcl/point_types.h>
#include <pcl/filters/voxel_grid.h>

#include <opencv2/core/ocl.hpp>
#include <dynamic_reconfigure/server.h>
#include <pses_kinect_filter/KinectFilterConfig.h>

Detailed Description

kinect_filter node. Applies a median filter to the kinect depth image and after that a voxelgrid based filter to its point cloud. This node publishes a topic with the filtered point cloud.

Definition in file kinect_filter.cpp.

Function Documentation

void dynReconfCallback ( FilterConfig &  inputConfig,
FilterConfig *  outConfig,
uint32_t  level 
)

This function will be called whenever a node parameter is changed over dynamic reconfigure.

Parameters
[in]inputConfigReference to the object containing the new configuration of the filter.
[out]outConfigPointer to the object where the new configuration of the filter has to be stored.
[in]levelThis parameter is not used by this callback and can be ignored.

Definition at line 37 of file kinect_filter.cpp.

void infoCallback ( const sensor_msgs::CameraInfo::ConstPtr &  cameraInfo,
sensor_msgs::CameraInfo *  output,
ros::Subscriber *  infoSubscriber 
)

This function will be once called after receving the first camera info message. Then the camera info topic will be unsuscribed from this node.

Parameters
[in]cameraInfoPointer to the object containing the new camera info message.
[out]outputPointer to the object where the camera info has to be stored.
[in]infoSubscriberPointer to the camera info subscriber.

Definition at line 101 of file kinect_filter.cpp.

void kinectCallback ( const sensor_msgs::Image::ConstPtr &  rawImgPtr,
sensor_msgs::Image *  procImg,
FilterConfig *  filterConfig 
)

This function will be called whenever a depth image is received over the corresponding ROS topic.

Parameters
[in]rawImgPtrPointer to the received depth image.
[out]procImgThis parameter is not used by this callback and can be ignored.
[in]filterConfigPointer to the object containing the configuration of the filter.

void pointCloudCallback ( const PointCloud::ConstPtr &  rawPointCloud,
PointCloud::Ptr  cloudFiltered,
FilterConfig *  filterConfig 
)

This function will be called whenever a point cloud message is received over its corresponding ROS topic.

Parameters
[in]rawPointCloudPointer to the received point cloud.
[out]cloudFilteredPointer to the object where the filtered point cloud has to be stored.
[in]filterConfigPointer to the object containing the configuration of the filter.
